articles.title: Texas Flooding Death Toll Surpasses 100 as Hope for Finding Survivors Fades
articles.description: The death toll from catastrophic floods in Texas has reached at least 100, including 28 children, as search and rescue efforts continue amid diminishing hopes for finding survivors.

articles.title: Elon Musk Launches 'America Party,' Tesla Shares Decline
articles.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk announced the formation of a new political entity, the 'America Party,' aiming to influence key legislative seats. Following the announcement, Tesla shares fell over 6%.

articles.title: President Trump Imposes Additional 10% Tariff on Countries Aligning with BRICS Policies
articles.description: President Donald Trump announced an additional 10% tariff on countries aligning with the 'Anti-American policies' of BRICS nations, escalating trade tensions.
